Eureka: Summary

edit

SUMMARY

  • Airs Next:SciFi at Tuesday 9:00 PM (60 min.)
  • Status:Returning Series
  • Premiered:July 18, 2006
  • Show Categories:Science-Fiction, Drama
Small town. Big secret.

A car accident leads U.S. Marshal Jack Carter into the top-secret Pacific Northwest town of Eureka. For decades, the United States government has relocated the world's geniuses to Eureka, a town where innovation and chaos have lived hand in hand.

Eureka is produced by NBC Universal Cable Studio and filmed in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada.
all episode list »
edit/add

LAST EPISODE

From Fear to Eternity

Aired: Tuesday September 23, 2008

As Eva Thorne prepares to seal off the subterranean military complex, Zoe's life is endangered as her body begins to rapidly age.
